messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] next years taiga drama
messages.msgSnippet: ... William, Not only the same period but the same people and events get recycled over and over, you can expect Hideyoshi, Ieyasu and Sakamoto Ryoma won t be
messages.messageBody:
William Letham wrote:

> , I'm very dissappointed that NHK will
> make yet another sengoku period drama

William,
Not only the same period but the same people and events get recycled over
and over, you can expect Hideyoshi, Ieyasu and Sakamoto Ryoma won't be off the
TV for too long...
Tom

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] next years taiga drama
messages.msgSnippet: ... From: Mark Hall  To:  Sent: Sunday, January 21, 2001 5:23 AM Subject: Re: [samuraihistory] next years taiga
messages.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: Mark Hall <markhall@...>
To: <samuraihistory@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, January 21, 2001 5:23 AM
Subject: Re: [samuraihistory] next years taiga drama


>
>
>
> | We're not three episodes into this years drama Hojo |Tokimune and I've
> heard that next years drama has |already been decided. I will be about
Maeda
> Toshie and |his wife. I've only heard this by word of mouth and not in
> |print. Can anyone confirm this?
>
> It was on NHK this week that the drama will be on
> Maeda Toshie. Filming starts in August.
>
> Later, Mark Hall
>
>
>
>while I'm certainly going to watch, I'm very dissappointed that NHK will
make yet another sengoku period drama when so many other periods have been
left untouched, especially since they had that other drama about Maeda a few
shogatsu ago. Whats wrong with Shotoku Taishi or Tenchi Tenno and his
brother Temmu Tenno.

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] next years taiga drama
messages.msgSnippet: ... heard that next years drama has |already been decided. I will be about Maeda Toshie and |his wife. I ve only heard this by word of mouth and not in ... It
messages.messageBody:
| We're not three episodes into this years drama Hojo |Tokimune and I've
heard that next years drama has |already been decided. I will be about Maeda
Toshie and |his wife. I've only heard this by word of mouth and not in
|print. Can anyone confirm this?

It was on NHK this week that the drama will be on
Maeda Toshie. Filming starts in August.

Later, Mark Hall

messages.subject: next years taiga drama
messages.msgSnippet: We re not three episodes into this years drama Hojo Tokimune and I ve heard that next years drama has already been decided. I will be about Maeda Toshie and
messages.messageBody:
We're not three episodes into this years drama Hojo Tokimune and I've heard that next years drama has already been decided. I will be about Maeda Toshie and his wife. I've only heard this by word of mouth and not in print. Can anyone confirm this?


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
